Text.Page:
It's our job to provide protection for the Mysterium researchers, so when they need some dangerous research ingredient, it's our job to get it. Now they want kumas cores! Can you believe it?

I need someone highly skilled. Like you, . Gather a party and get a couple cores from the {@LinkCreature:7#4#torpid kumases} for me, would you?
Great, you've got the cores. What'll they ask for next? Only Shara knows.
Do you have the cores? These Mysterium folk are breathing down my neck.
